name: Notice.AAA6.GeneralApps.WrittenRepresentationRequired.Applicant
titleEn: You need to provide written representation
titleCy: Mae angen i chi ddarparu cynrychiolaeth ysgrifenedig
descriptionEn: The court has requested that you must provide written representation. You must do this by 4pm on ${writtenRepApplicantDeadlineDateEn}.
descriptionCy: Mae'r llys wedi gofyn i chi ddarparu cynrychiolaeth ysgrifenedig. Rhaid i chi wneud hyn erbyn 4pm ar ${writtenRepApplicantDeadlineDateCy}.
